Lace blouse with a frilled collar, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with flared cuffs.
Underwired bra in semi-transparent microfibre with cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Soft, featherlight bra in mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in an airy, patterned weave with an elasticated waist, and decorative frills and a sewn-in wrapover at the sides.
Ankle-high, imitation suede sandals with cut-out sections and lacing. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8.5 cm.
Ankle-high, imitation suede sandals with cut-out sections and lacing. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8.5 cm.

Suede court shoes with rounded toes and an adjustable foot strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels approx. 11 cm. Supplied in a drawstring fabric bag.
Striped pull-on trousers in an airy viscose and linen weave. Regular waist with elastication and a drawstring, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Soft leather mules with fold-down heels and a concealed elastic gore in one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Soft leather mules with fold-down heels and a concealed elastic gore in one side. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Ankle-length chinos in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a detachable braided imitation leather belt.

Ankle-length chinos in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a detachable braided imitation leather belt.
